job_purpose: To drive full-stack development of the core healthcare platform and pioneer cutting-edge agentic tooling for mental health consultation support at Oqea.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and develop scalable applications using Vue.js frontend and Hono API backend
Build Python-based intelligent agents for mental health consultation support
Develop measurement frameworks to assess agent performance and accuracy
Implement fine-tuning workflows for continuous improvement of agent responses
Create seamless connections between full-stack applications and agentic systems
Monitor agent behavior, response quality, and system performance in clinical environments
Mentor junior developers in full-stack and AI domains
Ensure smooth integration between traditional web applications and intelligent agent workflows
required_qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience
7+ years of professional software development experience with strong full-stack capabilities
2+ years of experience with Python development and/or AI agent integration
Demonstrated experience in measuring and evaluating software system performance and quality
Previous technical leadership experience and mentoring capabilities
company_details: Oqea's mission is to create a place for connected wellbeing, changing how healthcare is delivered and received. The team has developed an online platform for consumers and providers to connect, collaborate, and communicate, aiming to bring self-help tools and professional support together to reduce isolation.
